KeyGroup.name: Numpad Movement
KeyGroup.script: zgui = zgui or {} zgui.ship = zgui.ship or {}

Key.name: north
Key.script: if zgui.keypadMode == "sailing" then send("ship turn north", false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "dash" then send("stand+open door north+dash north", false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "glide" then send("glide north", false) else send("stand+open door north+north", false) end

Key.name: northwest
Key.script: if zgui.keypadMode == "sailing" then send("ship turn northwest", false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "dash" then send("stand+open door northwest+dash northwest", false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "glide" then send("glide northwest", false) else send("stand+open door northwest+northwest", false) end

Key.name: northeast
Key.script: if zgui.keypadMode == "sailing" then send("ship turn northeast", false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "dash" then send("stand+open door northeast+dash northeast", false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "glide" then send("glide northeast", false) else send("stand+open door northeast+northeast", false) end

Key.name: west
Key.script: if zgui.keypadMode == "sailing" then send("ship turn west", false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "dash" then send("stand+open door west+dash west", false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "glide" then send("glide west", false) else send("stand+open door west+west", false) end

Key.name: east
Key.script: if zgui.keypadMode == "sailing" then send("ship turn east", false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "dash" then send("stand+open door east+dash east", false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "glide" then send("glide east", false) else send("stand+open door east+east", false) end

Key.name: southeast
Key.script: if zgui.keypadMode == "sailing" then send("ship turn southeast", false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "dash" then send("stand+open door southeast+dash southeast", false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "glide" then send("glide southeast", false) else send("stand+open door southeast+southeast", false) end

Key.name: south
Key.script: if zgui.keypadMode == "sailing" then send("ship turn south", false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "dash" then send("stand+open door south+dash south", false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "glide" then send("glide south", false) else send("stand+open door south+south", false) end

Key.name: southwest
Key.script: if zgui.keypadMode == "sailing" then send("ship turn southwest", false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "dash" then send("stand+open door southwest+dash southwest", false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "glide" then send("glide southwest", false) else send("stand+open door southwest+southwest", false) end

Key.name: up
Key.script: if zgui.keypadMode == "sailing" then send("climb mast", false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "dash" then send("stand+open door up+dash up", false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "glide" then send("glide up", false) else send("stand+open door up+up", false) end

Key.name: down
Key.script: if zgui.keypadMode == "sailing" then send("climb mast", false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "dash" then send("stand+open door down+dash down", false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "glide" then send("glide down", false) else send("stand+open door down+down", false) end

Key.name: in
Key.script: if zgui.keypadMode == "sailing" then send("ship stop turn",false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "dash" then send("stand+open door in+dash in", false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "glide" then send("glide in", false) else send("stand+open door in+in", false) end

Key.name: out
Key.script: if zgui.keypadMode == "sailing" then send("ship stop turn",false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "dash" then send("stand+open door out+dash out", false) elseif zgui.keypadMode == "glide" then send("glide out", false) else send("stand+open door out+out", false) end

Key.name: * Keypad Mode
Key.script: if gmcp.Room.Info.environment=='Vessel' and gmcp.Room.Info.num==-2 then if zgui.keypadMode =="sailing" then zgui.keypadMode = "normal" zgui.echo("Keypad Sailing Mode OFF") else zgui.keypadMode = "sailing" zgui.echo("Keypad Set to SAILING - (Press * to turn off)") end elseif string.match(gmcp.Room.Info.name, "Flying") then if zgui.keypadMode == "glide" then zgui.keypadMode = "normal" zgui.echo("Keypad Glide Mode OFF") else zgui.keypadMode = "glide" zgui.echo("Keypad Set to GLIDE - (Press * to turn off)") end elseif gmcp.Room.Info.num > 0 then if zgui.keypadMode == "dash" then zgui.keypadMode = "normal" zgui.echo("Keypad DASH Mode OFF") else zgui.keypadMode = "dash" zgui.echo("Keypad Set to DASH - (Press * to turn off)") end end
